data.title: Program Integrity: FY22 Audit Results
data.meta_description: Updated 7/24/24. The results chart includes audits where the findings have been finalized. Remaining audits are still under review. Information on Corrective Action Plans and Sanctions will be updated once approved by HRSA. HRSA recommends manufacturers do not contact audited entities regarding sanctions until a corrective action plan has been approved by HRSA and posted on this website.
